      dateTaken - the date and time the photo was taken
      caption - the caption of the photo

    • Photo

      Constructs a new Photo with the specified file path, date, caption, and tags.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the file path to the photo
      dateTaken - the date and time the photo was taken
      caption - the caption of the photo
      tags - the tags associated with the photo

      tagValue - the value of the tag
      allowMultipleValues - whether multiple values are allowed for this tag

    • addTag

      public void addTag(String tagName, Set<String> tagValue, boolean allowMultipleValues)
      Adds a set of tag values to the photo under a single tag name.
      Parameters:
      tagName - the name of the tag
      tagValue - a set of tag values
      allowMultipleValues - whether multiple values are allowed for this tag
